item.title: Pancakes
item.description: I think alot of people think making breakfast food is difficult. Perhaps they’re just too busy and would rather just head to Denny’s. I’d like to take a moment and share with you how easy it is to make good pancakes. Things you’ll need: Ingredients 1 1/2 cups of all purpose flour. 3 1/2 teaspoons of baking powder. 1 1/4 cups of milk. 1 Tablespoon of sugar. 1 Egg Tools A hot pan or griddle & some oil (vegetable or olive).

item.title: Pizza Dough
item.description: Making Pizza is not as hard as the Pizza Guy down the street would like you to believe. It is however a bit more complicated than making pancakes so I’d start with breakfast foods if you’re not the cooking type. Things you’ll need: Ingredients 2 1/3 Cups all-purpose flour 1 packet instant yeast (2 1/4 teapspoons dry yeast from jar) 1 1/2 teaspoons of sugar 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder (optional) 1/4 teaspoon basil leaves (optional) 2 Tablespoons of oil (Vegetable or olive) 3/4 Cup of warm water Toppings (Sauce, Shredded Cheese, whatever else you like.
